message.body: Maaco said they can prob remove stripe for 300 lol
Even if it's painted
K want to go test drive the car w me tonight one last time before I trade my car in
Or should I just get it
Um... Up to you
I'm totally fine coming with : )
Omg or I could get a 2005 Audi that is absolutely beautiful tho it has 128000 miles omg it is so gorg tho
Lol light orange leather interior and black exterior and I wanna lick it
I'm sure it'll die in like 4 yrs BuT it'll be so pretty for that time!
Don't you just want to slide into that seat?!!!
He's sending me the vin number so I can see the carfax history and then I'm test driving it tom at 3 unless you h8 it
Yeah I do... Until you spend a million bucks fixing it
Bobby says the time for being fly is done
I OWNED A AUDI
THEY COST A MILLION DOLLARS TO KEEP RUNNING
LIKE TWO MILLIONS DOLLARS
Hahaha
Ugh but it's so pretty come on
How do you know it'll break
hOW DO YoU KnOw
Lololol
So did my mom and it didn't die
Hahahaha
Fair enough
Though my time for being fly is never done
I'm just going to get better from now on forward
As is my life and my finances
But I acknowledge and hear you
Hahah
I know
Love you fly babe
Also I'm confused- the Acura I bought would have been expensive to keep fixing too, and had the same amt of miles
It's different
I mean, isn't that the situation I was in originally ? And I was fine w ? As was my dad clearly, who kept telling me to fix the car
Regardless of how much it cost
'If I really like it'
Ok
Like even now he said he'd give me whatever it cost to fix the car if I like my car
If you like the Audi it is a great car
Just wicked crazy expensive to fix
Everything is twice as much
Do they break down more?
Or have more problems in general than the Acura I had?
Gotcha
So this is sort of what you bought from your parents:
That is a very purty car
Mine was older and a hatchback
That's a great deal on a Audi
Oh that's nice. I didn't know that made hatchbacks
*they
And it's very good looking
It is very good looking indeed. I emailed them
And left a vm

My dad said if I wanted the 2006 Acura he'd give me the $ difference, but yeah I see how the scheduled maintenance and repairs would be so costly and maybe it is a bad idea but god is it purty why can't they make slow cars pretty on the outside/inside?
I don't care about having a sports car but why are the sports cars have so much more beautiful interiors?!!
*do
Like I want a car that drives slow but has pretty details why can't someone make that
Gross
Haha it's a little gross
I see that
This would be more fun to do together and w wine but I can't drink
It's kind of like scrolling through okc w your bestie and meangirling
But w cars
Cheaper than my car
Can I buy your moped from you? Eric really wants it and I need some leverage to get the magnum running to sell
Boo
Why do you keep trying to steal my bike
I'm sorry...
What do you need for the magnum
I'm kinda in a awkward position
I'll build you a bike. A beautiful bike. But I could really use the momentum to get a bunch or Orr things rolling in the shop
Why don't I just give you $
:( that bike is a nice memory for me
It's not about the money
To clarify, I do want my money for it too
It is a favor though and I am still giving it to you - bc I never wanted to sell it
It annoys me that I left an event for me, for something that is now being taken from me so it feels like it was never for me to begin w
But I'm willing to, as a favor, give it to him for what I paid
the gas and the lost networking that I gave up will just be out of the kindness of my heart
And the emotional wear that it cost me
And the ego hit that it costs me to know that my own property can be bullied out of me somehow
All of that is my gift to you. But I want my money back at least Jesus
Oh... I feel like I want to just give him the new bike instead. If he'll take it id prefer to over causing you the stress

Nah do what is best for you, but just realize you owe me and don't try to hide behind 'oh ya but you can't ride it now anyway.' It is crappy and now you've already ruined the bike for me prob so you might as well sell it
Objects have emotional value for me
Hence my paintings being worth 2,000 dollars
Hence my interest in painting objects and the memories they carry
Don't tell me what my own stuff is worth to me
But now I prob won't enjoy it anyway so sell it. It's been annoying for months now to keep getting asked when I kept saying It wasn't for sale
Dinky dependable cars

I'm going to just get a cute car that I like bc my dad said he'd pay for any repairs and it was fine. So I'm deciding between the 2006 Subaru wagon w all leather interior or a $6000 BMW that I Know costs a million to repair and I know has a million potential issues bc I've been k-holing into the depths of online car websites for the past two days but I dont care bc it is fucking adorable so there
And the Audi that had 68,000 miles
The Subaru is a good deal and kinda perfect for both of us
Bc you can put mopeds in it, but it is still really pretty and good miles per gallon and 4 wheel drive
The off road Audi btw claims it can haul a trailor
Also, tom sent an email saying all the stuff had to be out- but not sure why it is automatically your fault. His text back just said to warn you that all the stuff in the basement was getting tossed
But he didn't say he thought it was your stuff
He warned me in case it was mine too
I told him the drum In living room was mine
The whole thing is dumb though- what's the point of having a house if tenants can keep their stuff in shared spaces- if it bothers other roomies then they should complain via email
It's not a landlord issue
*if tenants can't keep their stuff
I don't give a fuck if Avery keeps his bikes in the basement
And it's obv his bikes that tom is mainly talking about
Maybe getting it and getting a private extended warranty since the car is so notoriously unreliable
(BUT SO CUTE)
Or just fake an extended warranty to MYsELF
Oh oh are you home?
Oh I'm here
I just ate some food and packed my things
I'm in your room but it's ok if you aren't coming home, id stay here anyway
That cute Subaru is gone
I'm going to start looking outside Philly
Oops lol
Hahahaha
